p: The milk thistle ( Silybium marianum L.) seeds were collected from plants growing in region of Sousse (Centre of Tunisia), during April and June, 2012. The seeds were authenticated at the National Botanical Research Institute Tunisia (INRAT). Seeds were selected according to external color; green seeds were chosen as immature stage, mahogany brown seeds as the intermediate stage and dark brown seeds as the last stage of maturity (mature stage).
